wikipedia_page.main: Edward Dawson (14 March 1802 – 1 June 1859) was an English Liberal Party politician.  He was a Member of Parliament (MP) for South Leicestershire from 1832 to 1835.

response: * Edward Dawson (basketball) (1907–1998), Canadian Olympic basketball player
* Edward Dawson (politician) (1802–1859), English politician, MP for Leicestershire South 1832–1835
